text: Richard George Rogers, Baron Rogers of Riverside (23 July 1933 â€“ 18 December 2021) was an Italian-British architect. He was known for his modernist and functionalist designs in high-tech architecture. Rogers was born in Florence, Italy. In 2007, Rogers won the Pritzker Prize.
